node.title: New paper about sunflower clonal regenaration by tissue culture
node.summary: Our paper on an endangered sunflower tissue culture was accepted to MDPI Plants.

node.title: New paper about barley germination
node.summary: Our barley germination paper highlights the physiological background of barley seed reaction to drought.

node.title: New papers about Eastern Redbud, Cercis canadensis L.
node.summary: Meher Ony MS publishes her thesis research on redbud diversity.

node.title: Redbud haplotyping - Trinity Hamm proposal seminar

node.title: 30th USDA Interagency Research Forum on Invasive Species
node.summary: With my student Shiwnai Sapkota, we attended the exciting Forum on Invasive Species in Annapolis, MD.
